#summary A listing of Inventory services you should add

= Introduction =

When the Registering a new patient, the program has to pick an inventory service to charge the patient/customer.  This page lists what entries you should enter and edit for inventory services needed for hospital operation.


= Details =

Add the following items to the Item Master:
  # Consultation Common
  # Consultation Common+Private
  # Consultation Private
  # Consultation Very Private
  # Nursing Common
  # Nursing Common+Private
  # Nursing Private
  # Nursing Very Private
  # Room Common
  # Room Common+Private
  # Room Private
  # Room Very Private

All these items should be marked as: Service, For Sale, Selectable, Dispensable.
